Html:
Hi,

I like to use graph sharp for a multi-touch graph visualization project. I highly appreciate if someone can points me to relevant methods that I should look into to replace the mouse select, drag by WPF touch up, touch move event.

If it very hard to incorporate touch in grpahsharp, also let me know. It will save me time and I might start to write my own API for muli-touch graph visualization and exploration.

 

Thank you very much for your time.

 

~Zabed
